com.vaadin.fluent.api

Interface FluentTabSheet<THIS extends FluentTabSheet<THIS>>

  • Type Parameters:
    THIS - Self-referential generic THIS
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.Component.Focusable, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.event.ContextClickEvent.ContextClickNotifier, com.vaadin.event.FieldEvents.BlurNotifier, com.vaadin.event.FieldEvents.FocusNotifier, FluentAbstractComponent<THIS>, FluentAbstractComponentContainer<THIS>, FluentClientConnector<THIS>, FluentComponent<THIS>, FluentComponent.FluentFocusable<THIS>, FluentComponentContainer<THIS>, FluentContextClickNotifier<THIS>, FluentFieldEvents.FluentBlurNotifier<THIS>, FluentFieldEvents.FluentFocusNotifier<THIS>, FluentHasComponents<THIS>, FluentHasComponents.FluentComponentAttachDetachNotifier<THIS>, FluentSizeable<THIS>, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents.ComponentAttachDetachNotifier, Iterable<com.vaadin.ui.Component>, Serializable, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FTabSheet

    public interface FluentTabSheet<THIS extends FluentTabSheet<THIS>>
extends FluentComponent.FluentFocusable<THIS>, FluentFieldEvents.FluentFocusNotifier<THIS>, FluentFieldEvents.FluentBlurNotifier<THIS>, FluentAbstractComponentContainer<THIS>
    The base interface for fluent versions of TabSheet
    See Also:
    TabSheet

    • Method Detail

      • withSelectedTabChangeListener

        default THIS withSelectedTabChangeListener(com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet.SelectedTabChangeListener listener)
        Adds a tab selection listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the Listener to be added, not null
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        Registration, TabSheet.addSelectedTabChangeListener(SelectedTabChangeListener)

      • withTab

        default THIS withTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component c)
        Adds a new tab into TabSheet. Component caption and icon are copied to the tab metadata at creation time. If the tab sheet already contains the component, it does nothing. If you want the returned TabSheet.Tab instead, use TabSheet.addTab(Component)
        Parameters:
        c - the component to be added onto tab - should not be null.
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.addTab(Component)

      • withTab

        default THIS withTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component component,
                     int position)
        Adds a new tab into TabSheet. Component caption and icon are copied to the tab metadata at creation time. If the tab sheet already contains the component, its tab is returned. If you want the returned TabSheet.Tab instead, use TabSheet.addTab(Component, int)
        Parameters:
        component - the component to be added onto tab - should not be null.
        position - The position where the tab should be added
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.addTab(Component, int)

      • withTab

        default THIS withTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component c,
                     String caption)
        Adds a new tab into TabSheet. The first tab added to a tab sheet is automatically selected and a tab selection event is fired. If the component is already present in the tab sheet, it only changes its caption preserving other tab metadata. If you want the returned TabSheet.Tab instead, use TabSheet.addTab(Component, String).
        Parameters:
        c - the component to be added onto tab - should not be null.
        caption - the caption to be set for the component and used rendered in tab bar
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.addTab(Component, String)

      • withTab

        default THIS withTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component c,
                     String caption,
                     com.vaadin.server.Resource icon)
        Adds a new tab into TabSheet. The first tab added to a tab sheet is automatically selected and a tab selection event is fired. If the component is already present in the tab sheet, it only changes its caption and icon, preserving other tab metadata. If you want the returned TabSheet.Tab instead, use TabSheet.addTab(Component, String, Resource).
        Parameters:
        c - the component to be added onto tab - should not be null.
        caption - the caption to be set for the component and used rendered in tab bar
        icon - the icon to be set for the component and used rendered in tab bar
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.addTab(Component, String, Resource)

      • withTab

        default THIS withTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component tabComponent,
                     String caption,
                     com.vaadin.server.Resource icon,
                     int position)
        Adds a new tab into TabSheet. The first tab added to a tab sheet is automatically selected and a tab selection event is fired. If the component is already present in the tab sheet, it only changes its caption and icon, preserving other tab metadata like the position. If you want the returned TabSheet.Tab instead, use TabSheet.addTab(Component, String, Resource, int).
        Parameters:
        tabComponent - the component to be added onto tab - should not be null.
        caption - the caption to be set for the component and used rendered in tab bar
        icon - the icon to be set for the component and used rendered in tab bar
        position - the position at where the the tab should be added.
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.addTab(Component, String, Resource, int)

      • withCloseHandler

        default THIS withCloseHandler(com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet.CloseHandler handler)
        Provide a custom TabSheet.CloseHandler for this TabSheet if you wish to perform some additional tasks when a user clicks on a tabs close button, e.g. show a confirmation dialogue before removing the tab. To remove the tab, if you provide your own close handler, you must call ComponentContainer.removeComponent(Component) yourself. The default CloseHandler for TabSheet will only remove the tab.
        Parameters:
        handler - the close handler
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setCloseHandler(CloseHandler)

      • withSelectedTab

        default THIS withSelectedTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component component)
        Sets the selected tab. The tab is identified by the tab content component. Does nothing if the tabsheet doesn't contain the component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component of the tab to select
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setSelectedTab(Component)

      • withSelectedTab

        default THIS withSelectedTab(com.vaadin.ui.Component component,
                             boolean userOriginated)
        Sets the selected tab. The tab is identified by the tab content component. Does nothing if the tabsheet doesn't contain the component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component of the tab to select
        userOriginated - true if the event originates from the client side, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setSelectedTab(Component, boolean)

      • withSelectedTab

        default THIS withSelectedTab(com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet.Tab tab)
        Sets the selected tab. The tab is identified by the corresponding Tab instance. Does nothing if the tabsheet doesn't contain the given tab.
        Parameters:
        tab - the tab to select
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setSelectedTab(Tab)

      • withSelectedTab

        default THIS withSelectedTab(int index)
        Sets the selected tab, identified by its index. Does nothing if the position is out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the tab to select
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setSelectedTab(int)

      • withTabCaptionsAsHtml

        default THIS withTabCaptionsAsHtml(boolean tabCaptionsAsHtml)
        Sets whether HTML is allowed in the tab captions.

        If set to true, the captions are rendered in the browser as HTML and the developer is responsible for ensuring no harmful HTML is used. If set to false, the content is rendered in the browser as plain text.

        The default is false, i.e. render tab captions as plain text

        Parameters:
        tabCaptionsAsHtml - true if the tab captions are rendered as HTML, false if rendered as plain text
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setTabCaptionsAsHtml(boolean)

      • withTabPosition

        default THIS withTabPosition(com.vaadin.ui.TabSheet.Tab tab,
                             int position)
        Sets the position of the tab.
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab
        position - The new position of the tab
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setTabPosition(Tab, int)

      • withTabsVisible

        default THIS withTabsVisible(boolean tabsVisible)
        Sets whether the tab selection part should be shown in the UI
        Parameters:
        tabsVisible - true if the tabs should be shown in the UI, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        TabSheet.setTabsVisible(boolean)
